title: Heart on Fire
description: A heart shown on fire, for extreme or passionate forms of love or lust. Most representative of desire or lust, this emoji may also indicate a sense of burning a past love and moving on.
apple_vendor_description: The heart on fire emoji on Apple devices burns with a passionate intensity, its fiery orange and red hues vividly rendered with a glossy, 3D effect. Realistic lighting catches the edges of the flames, giving them a dynamic, almost flickering appearance, while the heart itself maintains Apple's signature soft rounded edges. This emoji powerfully conveys intense love, burning desire, or a passionate rekindling of feelings, making it a potent symbol for strong emotions.
